algorithm_technique: Prefix sum calculation with a min-heap to track and remove negative contributions.
problem_summary_simple: Minimize operations (moving elements to end) to make all prefix sums non-negative.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through nums, maintaining prefix sum and a min-heap of encountered numbers to fix negative prefix sums.
key_insights: When a prefix sum becomes negative, we need to remove the smallest negative number encountered so far.
A min-heap efficiently stores and retrieves the smallest element.
Moving the smallest negative number to the end effectively 'removes' its negative impact on future prefix sums.
